website_summaries.verdict: This is a comprehensive kit for anyone looking to get into creating jewelry, including all necessary tools and a wide range of beads.
pros: Beads are high in quality and not flimsy
Beads come in a range of shapes, sizes, and colors, catering to virtually every style
Purchase includes embroidered pouch to keep jewelry in, which is a nice touch
cons: Box that items come in is not extremely durable

customer_reviews.title: Everything it’s says
customer_reviews.text: I am starting to make jewelry and this kit starts you off with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Shefgirl21

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I've been beading for over 25 years. I was looking for a starter set for my 19 year old daughter for Christmas. This set was awful! The pliers came with a broken spring and the other tools look like they won't hold up either. The description indicates these are nice glass beads but they are cheap plastic. None of the beautiful beads that are in the manual are included in the set. Deffinitely not worth the amount I paid. I wouldn't pay $15 for this set. Very dissappointing to figure this out Christmas morning. Returning these ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Sara A. Slade

customer_reviews.title: It would be good for a novice or younger person
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. I think the amount of items you get is not worth the money. I was expecting quite a bit more. I went to Hobby Lobby, spent the same amount and got a ton more beads. It would be good for a novice or younger person.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cegerenko

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. This was bought for my tween who is getting into making her own jewelry. I bought this for her as a start up kit and it was such a great kit to start with. I'd highly recommend you try this out if you are starting to get into jewelry making or want to get your kit started or add extras to your growing kit. Great price for all in the set vs buying individually (esp. the tools) would be more out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice W.

customer_reviews.title: Only received a partial refund
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it is not a good value for what you get, but I only received a partial refund. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Lora T.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old just loved this kept her busy for hours and she felt really good about making her friend's braclet's and necklace's for Christmas... Really worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Dallasgrl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't look impressive.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a big box...I bought this for a teenage young women who needs support...and for the price I was hoping for a better display...as in a big visual. It had everything in there...but just didn't look impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Tyler Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety in the set but I was disappointed in the flimsy cardboard box. Of course it doesn't say it comes in a plastic case; that was my assumption from the picture. My granddaughter is having fun experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Marrapodi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The kit contained everything mentioned, but not near the quality I was expecting. The beads are ALL plastic, even the metal-looking ones. The tools have great shaped handles, but that's all. The flat faced plier doesnt even close all the way. The technique and design guide only has some poorly formatted hints and no real projects. Most of what is mentioned is not even included, so you will have to go buy more things just to complete anything. Even the crown knot bracelet requires additional waxed cording that is not included. Overall very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for Christmas as a starter set. she loves it and its good qualityl
customer_reviews.author: G. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beginners Kit
customer_reviews.text: The product was okay given the value for money, however, if you're looking for something more professional, don't buy this product. Better for beginners and young ones who want to try to learn something to do with their hands. Good as a gift for young people. Overall, the product was not what I expected, probably, better to go to a craft store and pick out stuff for yourself. The pliers were not as good as I wanted them to be but they do the job okay. Generally an "okay" package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginer
customer_reviews.text: Kit has everything needed to start jewelry making. Easy to use.Instructions were easy to follow. Purchased a set of divider trays to go with it, and am now making jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: David Overmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 13-year old niece. She loved it! She’s very creative, so I know she’ll be able to make some adorable jewelry with this kit. Quick delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: this is a very useful kit. It is full of useful tools and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a very useful kit. It is full of useful tools and beautiful beads. It does have everything you need to start making jewelry. It is very good kit. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: maureen christianson

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Present for a pre teen. Came in cardboard box but has fabric case to put the beads in. Hours of fun packed into a box. Not for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnda

customer_reviews.title: She said it was a great addition to her jewelry making supplies
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for my wife's mother. She was thrilled with all that was contained in the set. She said it was a great addition to her jewelry making supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids or adults. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing jewelry kit that doesn’t scream little kid. Got this for our college age daughter and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: all was included
customer_reviews.text: for just starting out making jewelry this is a good set, the tools are amazing I use them all. the rest of the set is of course gone already. Never thought of using claw clamps for necklaces till I got them in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Courier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bead assortment
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet. This is a Christmas gift for my niece
customer_reviews.author: Tina Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this Jewelry Making Kit multiple times for gifts and everyone has loved it.
customer_reviews.author: CJARDH

customer_reviews.title: She is just starting out making jewelry and I think this kit is a good starting point
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift for my daughter. She is just starting out making jewelry and I think this kit is a good starting point.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and not entirely as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as described in the listing. Showed it with a carrying case, actually came in a flimsy cardboard box. Not worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Gorgeous set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set as a novice beaded jewelry maker. It made everything easy and you can make lots of pieces with this set. Gorgeous beads.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Nice beads
customer_reviews.text: Good for bracelets. Earring wire and posts bent and not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Louise DeFazio

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: It gave me a lot of good ideas using these products
customer_reviews.author: Tiaunda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small but still nice. Just the oucture makes it look karger.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginner's Fun
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything a beginner needs to get started. Perfect for my daughter and I to learn from and just have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit to make jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old daughter and she loved it. Great instructions and materials to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good for begginers
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice set for those who wan to full their time and to make nice things for themselfs
customer_reviews.author: Nitu Nicoleta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mother-in-law loved this set. She's already made a lot of accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Zonablazer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter how LOVES this kit! Beautiful beads!
customer_reviews.author: Bobi M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter kit, good mix of a little of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F Beckman

customer_reviews.title: ... will have to say for the first time I'm disappointed with an order placed with you
customer_reviews.text: I will have to say for the first time I'm disappointed with an order placed with you! I feel the product was over priced for what was in it and that there was no plastic box for the beads and not very many of those either
customer_reviews.author: carol debord

customer_reviews.title: Beading Box
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a larger book on beading. I should've read the description better.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked what I got. It was perfect for teaching my daughter how to make jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Krassow

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if my wife actually enjoyed making jewelry like she claimed..
customer_reviews.author: Trenton L.

customer_reviews.title: The product was great, it had everything I needed to get started
customer_reviews.text: The product was great, it had everything I needed to get started. Very nice presentation and very nice beads. The only setback was the guide which had parts left out, leading to a little bit of confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Anneabelle007

customer_reviews.title: Good for starting out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother as a birthday gift. She was interested in starting to make jewelry. She likes the kit and it has everything she needs currently to make bracelets and necklaces. Good quality tools and some pretty beads included. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie L

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for anyone starting their own ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone starting their own DIY. It has everything you need. One thing I would add is the beading board.
customer_reviews.author: Penny T.

customer_reviews.title: Not for serious jewelry makers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit for the tools alone, but as far as what else comes with it, it is not durable at all. Most of the pieces feel like they are just cheap plastic. The fittings bend very easily and some of the jewelry I made with is came part because of it. If you are serious about making jewelry, this will not provide you with quality pieces.
customer_reviews.author: K. Doran

customer_reviews.title: Nicely organized and packaged
customer_reviews.text: wow ! seriously impressed ! high quality tools, glass beads. Lots more stuff than I expected. Nicely organized and packaged. Great price and great gift. I will purchase this again. Really really really pleasantly surprised. Also no odor/stink with the box or products (thankfully) I am 100% pleased. great gift and great to own. Get one !
customer_reviews.author: Pat Davis

customer_reviews.title: No box. Nice beads.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed not to receive the pink plastic box storage box which was one of the main things that caused me to select this particular kit. The four packs of assorted beads are quite nice. They are light in weight suitable for earrings. The 3 tools do not spring open very well but seem they will be adequate.
customer_reviews.author: insf

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Reviewed the contents before wrapping and there is a good assortment of items to get someone started making jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth61

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my aunt n her 60th birthday. She is a creative person and this gift made her pursue a new hobby of jewelery making. The tools and the bead collection s excellent. Includes everything needed for makng necklaces earings and bracelets. Come with a beautiful embroidered pouch to keep your jewellery , tools or beads in. She loveeed it!
customer_reviews.author: SaRa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheaper, cheapest product I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointing product. I’m shocked that amazon would allow this company to put their name on their product. The description of the product was very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: JNorris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry making starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my grandaughter. She had interest in making jewelry and Amazon delivered the perfect starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up as a gift for my daughter as a starter kit. She seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora A.

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend loves it, I guess that's all that ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it, I guess that's all that matters at the moment lol. The item did look as advertised to me at first glance
customer_reviews.author: Dijimba

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this box
customer_reviews.text: There are so many beads and findings to make just about anything you can imagine. So happy I found this box.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Brock

product_meta.title: Adults Deluxe Jewelry Making Beads Mix Pliers Findings Starter Kit Gift Set
product_meta.description: This is a really lovely Adults Beginners Jewelry Making Kit. All you need to get started up straight away. Including the three main pliers needed to : Round Nose Pliers / Flat Nose Pliers / Side Cutters.Please note that beads may vary slightly due to us improving our mixes or for discontinued reasons but we can assure you that you will be happy with your purchase.Also included are three beautiful Colour Mixed Bead Kits to start you on your journey!A small Jewelry Making Bead Book.All packaged in a nice pink box that would be a lovely gift.
feature_bullets: Approx x 2650 components are in this Deluxe Jewelry making kit with everything you need to get you started making Jewelry. The Kit includes the following items

20 page detailed beginners instruction booklet which includes everything you need to know to get you started making jewelry 3 sets of Jewelry Pliers Round Nose Chain Nose Cutting Pliers. Silver beading tiger wire 6 colorful elastic nylon Thread

680 beads consisting of 4 sets of coloured packs green red purple blue. Each bead pack includes approximately 170 carefully selected eye catching beads of assorted sizes with which you could make over 25 stunning pieces of bespoke jewelry. 360 Nickel and Cadmium Free findings allowing you to make necklaces bracelets earrings Findings consist of 100 jump rings 50 earwires 50 Eyepins 10 Lobster Clasps 50 Crimp Beads 50 Spacer Beads 50 Headpins

Approx 1600 seed beads in total which consists of 8 coloured seed bead packs stored in separate compartments within a self contained portable reusable plastic bead box. This will enable you to make as many as 8 beautiful Crown Knot bracelets instructions on how to make these are included within this pack. Jewelry organiser Included This in itself is a real gem a beautiful high quality decorative embroidered faux silk Travel Jewelry Roll in which to store all your handmade jewelry

This really is a fantastic jewelry making kit perfect for girls 13 yrs up to adult whether to give to a teen mom sister grandmother girlfriend wife or just to make for yourself. A great new hobby and craft or a holiday pastime or why not organize a beading birthday party with your friends and family.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
